name: Bojabie
tag_list: video-conferencing, video-broadcasting, online-storage, social-media, social-media-power-tool, social-communication, white-boarding, cloud-storage, voice-over-ip, voip, streaming-media-center, video-communications-center, social-communications-center
overview:
Bojabie brings the essence of all social communication media in one easy to use system. Bojabie helps you more successfully network with your business associates, customers, peers, and family.

The Bojabie Platform: Video and Social Communication Center Media Center White Boarding Voice Over IP Social Networking Internet File Storage Mobile Message Posting Communication Center

Video Conferencing: Create a real time video conference with up to 8 presenters and hundreds of viewers

Video Broadcasting: Broadcast, live, across the globe with multiple presenters

Record Your Presentations: Record your presentations for on demand viewing at a later date

Video Chat: See who you are talking to on your Android or iOS mobile device

IM/Text: Instant Message or Text your organization or team Share: Post to Facebook and Twitter from your Bojabie homepage

Simplify: View and manage all your email and IM accounts from a single location

Blog: Create and share your story

Music Player: Upload, manage and listen to all your music from any Internet device

Video Player: Upload, manage, share or play your videos from any Internet appliance

Picture Player: Share your pictures with Friends, Family and colleagues–Privately

–
